name: EPS Floor Slabs
description: EPS (Expanded Polystyrene) floor slabs designed to reduce weight and costs in construction, offering thermal and acoustic insulation, plus greater agility in construction.

hero.title: EPS Floor Slabs
hero.description: Light and economical solutions for slabs with superior thermal and acoustic insulation.

categoryDescription.title: Isoart EPS Floor Slabs offer lightness, economy and excellent thermal performance, optimizing construction and ensuring comfort at lower cost.
categoryDescription.description: Isoart EPS Floor Slabs are a light and efficient solution for civil construction, replacing traditional systems with advantages. Produced with expanded polystyrene (EPS), they provide reduced load on foundations, greater agility in construction and excellent thermal and acoustic insulation. Ideal for projects that require productivity, comfort and cost-effectiveness, according to ABNT NBR 14859 standards.

benefits.title: Weight reduction
benefits.description: Reduces structural load, optimizing foundations and pillars.

benefits.title: Thermal insulation
benefits.description: Reduces the need for air conditioning, ensuring comfort.

benefits.title: Construction savings
benefits.description: Reduces up to 20% of costs with materials and labor.

generalCharacteristics: Lightness with average density of 13-20 kg/m³
Thermal insulation with coefficient of 0.028 Kcal/h.m.°C
Easy cutting and adaptation on site

applications.title: Lightness and efficiency for slabs in residential and commercial projects
applications.description: Isoart EPS Floor Slabs are ideal for constructions that seek cost reduction and greater speed in execution. With excellent thermal and acoustic insulation, they are perfect for lattice slabs and floor filling in residential, commercial and industrial works.

tabDescriptions.Structural load relief: The lightness of EPS significantly reduces the self-weight of the slab compared to traditional systems, relieving load on foundations, pillars and beams, allowing for more economical and efficient sizing.
tabDescriptions.Construction savings: EPS slabs offer savings in materials, time and labor, with simple assembly and reduction in the use of concrete, steel and wooden forms, according to ABNT NBR 14859.
tabDescriptions.Thermal and acoustic insulation: EPS provides excellent thermal (0.028 Kcal/h.m.°C) and acoustic insulation, reducing air conditioning costs and improving environmental comfort.
tabDescriptions.Project flexibility: Produced to measure, EPS slabs adapt to different spans and formats, facilitating the passage of electrical and hydraulic installations.
